title: Il Sole 24 Ore typeface
content:
Does anybody know which typeface is this?

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821091034im_/http:/s14.postimg.org/kw8fspa0h/sshot_22.png)
author: Sylph

comments.content: It's their own corporate typeface simply called "Sole Serif", Sole Serif Display Headline Bold for your sample to be specific. It has been designed by [Molotro Luciano Perondi](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821091034/http:/www.molotro.com/sole.html).
